description: The status subresource of a service to set .spec.loadBalancer.ingress[].ip, it is allowed even when the .spec.type is not "LoadBalancer". However, when the user subsequently updates the service spec in any way, .status.loadBalancer is wiped.
expected-behaviour: When a user updates the status subresource of a service to set .spec.loadBalancer.ingress[].ip, it should only be allowed if .spec.type is "LoadBalancer". If the user updates the service spec in any way afterwards, .status.loadBalancer should not be wiped.
